title: Boxed in by shifting tariff rules, European shippers pause some U.S.-bound parcels
summary: New customs regulations take effect August 29, and many European postal agencies and companies say until new systems are set up they can't ship some goods. Gifts worth less than $100 are not affected.

title: Nigeria says it killed 35 fighters in air strikes near border with Cameroon
summary: Strikes are latest by the Nigerian military as it battles resurgence of attacks by armed groups in country's northeast.
